about_the_game:
*DEMO OUT NOW AND BEING ACTIVELY UPDATED*

Wizard Shrimp is a bullet-hell roguelike game where you play as a Shrimp who inexplicably is also a Wizard?!
Battle your way out of three different areas whilst gaining many different upgrades and power ups to become the most powerful Shrimp this world has ever seen!

Pixel art graphics are accompanied by a modern soundtrack that mixes digital and analogue sounds, embracing naturalistic samples.

Choose your own path out of each area with a unique randomly generated tile system. Leverage your tiles to your tactical advantage by putting a campfire after an enemy encounter. Or say "f*** it" and put down only enemy tiles up until the boss, gaining the most amount of power possible but with a higher risk of death!
